thread.title: Good service and a quiet night
thread.title_full: Good service and a quiet night - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Hoptonjohn
title: Good service and a quiet night
text: This is my first review of this hotel but have stayed many times before. My room was on the 6th floor over looking the Eurostar station. As ever nice and quiet and a decent shower. Check in and out was quick while breakfast was not too busy at 0700. Good access by road and cheap (for London) parking make this an ideal business hotel for me.
